nodes.text: Star Wars: The Further Adventures is a series of two Read-Along Adventures book-and-record/book-and-tape sets published by Buena Vista Records in 1983. Both entries in the series are adaptations of issues from Marvel Comics' Star Wars series.
A STAR WARS BOOK AND RECORD
Give your child a head start in learning to read with this 24 PAGE BOOK filled with full-color illustrations and a 7 INCH 33 1/3 RPM long playing READ-ALONG RECORD.
Each book and record combination is a fun filled experience in music and story adventure featuring:
SEE the pictures – HEAR the record – READ the book
